languages.text: "Истина проистекает от Императора. В тебе ее нет, а значит, ты — не истинная версия, а лишь ущербная копия, вырожденная ущербной реальностью".
"Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."
languages.original_text: "Истина проистекает от Императора. В тебе ее нет, а значит, ты — не истинная версия, а лишь ущербная копия, вырожденная ущербной реальностью".

traits.locale_text: "Truth comes from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius а but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

traits.locale_text: "Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."

languages.text: « La vérité émane de l'Empereur. Vous n'en disposez pas, ce qui signifie que vous n'êtes pas {mf|le|la} véritable von Valancius, mais une réplique imparfaite engendrée par une réalité elle aussi imparfaite. »
languages.original_text: "Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."

traits.locale_text: « La vérité émane de l'Empereur. Vous n'en disposez pas, ce qui signifie que vous n'êtes pas {mf|le|la} véritable von Valancius, mais une réplique imparfaite engendrée par une réalité elle aussi imparfaite. »
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: «La verdad proviene del Emperador. Careces de ella, por lo que no eres {mf|el|la} verdader{mf|o|a} von Valancius sino una réplica defectuosa de una realidad fallida».
languages.original_text: "Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."

traits.locale_text: «La verdad proviene del Emperador. Careces de ella, por lo que no eres {mf|el|la} verdader{mf|o|a} von Valancius sino una réplica defectuosa de una realidad fallida».
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: “真理源于帝皇。你无法理解真理，也就是说，你并不是真正的冯·瓦兰修斯。你只不过是个有缺陷的冒牌货，从残缺的现实中诞生。”
languages.original_text: "Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."

traits.locale_text: “真理源于帝皇。你无法理解真理，也就是说，你并不是真正的冯·瓦兰修斯。你只不过是个有缺陷的冒牌货，从残缺的现实中诞生。”
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: 「真実は皇帝に由来するものだ。お前にはそれが欠けている。つまり、お前は真のフォン・ヴァランシウスではなく、欠陥のある現実から生まれた欠陥のあるレプリカなのだ」
languages.original_text: "Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."

traits.locale_text: 「真実は皇帝に由来するものだ。お前にはそれが欠けている。つまり、お前は真のフォン・ヴァランシウスではなく、欠陥のある現実から生まれた欠陥のあるレプリカなのだ」
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Die Wahrheit stammt vom Imperator. Euch fehlt sie, und das bedeutet, dass Ihr nicht {mf|der|die} echte von Valancius seid, sondern eine mangelhafte Kopie, die aus einer mangelhaften Realität heraus entstanden ist."
languages.original_text: "Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wahrheit stammt vom Imperator. Euch fehlt sie, und das bedeutet, dass Ihr nicht {mf|der|die} echte von Valancius seid, sondern eine mangelhafte Kopie, die aus einer mangelhaften Realität heraus entstanden ist."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: "Hakikat, İmparator'dan gelir. Sende hakikat eksik, yani gerçek von Valancius değilsin. Hatalı bir gerçeklikte doğmuş, hatalı bir kopyasın."
languages.original_text: "Truth stems from the Emperor. You are lacking it, which means you are not the true von Valancius but a flawed replica born out of a flawed reality."
